modName: Ambriel - the lost Princess (Vanilla Voice Version)
summary:
Female Follower
- half human - half darkelves-race
- 1handed combat style
- DarkElves magical powers
- Blade-Class
- Elven-Gilded-Armor
- CBBE / UNP / UNPB / 7Base
- marriageable
- Quest (see Fully Voiced Quest Version)
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=#C00000][font=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=10]Ambriel - the lost Princess[/SIZE][/font][/color][/i][/b]

Update-information 16.09.2016:

After 2 years I finished the work on Ambriel  (fully voiced standalone follower).
All follower functions + quest have been spoken by fantastic voice actors :D
Watch the video in the video section to get a first impression.

ATTENTION:
The "fully-voiced"-version is published within the companions-section!
Upload on the 16th of September 2016.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78762/?][img]https://i.imgur.com/bW381YM.gif[/img][/url]






[img]http://i.imgur.com/pmtiMt7.jpg[/img]
Daughter of Emperor Pelagius III and Empress Katariah

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/dYQdPu4.jpg[/img]
Born a long time ago as the daughter of Emperor Pelagius III and
Empress Katariah, she was half-human half-dunmer.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/QUcn5Vg.jpg[/img]
On a warm night in Sun's Dawn in his 34th year, Pelagius Septim III
died after a brief fever in his cell at the Temple of Kynareth on
the Isle of Betony. Katariah I reigned for another 46 years.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IYeMUPi.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/c5RRbzG.jpg[/img]
After the assassination of her mother by an outcast branch of the
Septim, she fled and lived hidden for many years in various parts of Tamriel.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/52Cupbp.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VvTZ3d0.jpg[/img]
With the beginning of the Oblivion Crisis she joined the Imperial
Army to fight the Daedra.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/6J3c1mP.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6ZJu9c1.jpg[/img]
When the Thalmor declared war against the Empire, she was determined
to defend the Empire and the Emperor. As a symbol of the unity between
Humans and Elves, the Thalmor hunted Ambriel, but they never captured
her.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/RQfgWyv.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/npZnfgG.jpg[/img]
After Ambriels participation in the final battle between the Empire
and the Thalmor, she hid in the area of Winterhold. The Battle
was won but the Thalmor never gave up their hunt.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Lh70PTH.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UPPZJnq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TrMIvJO.jpg[/img]
Disguised as an elven soldier she managed to escape
before the Thalmor.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/rNxdXsQ.jpg[/img]
Now Ambriel takes every opportunity to fight the Thalmor,
waiting in the The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/fZENB7A.jpg[/img]

Female Follower
- half human - half darkelves-race
- 1handed combat style
- DarkElves magical powers
- Blade-Class
- Elven-Gilded-Armor
- CBBE-version


[color=#C00000][i][b][size=3]Installation:[/size][/b][/i][/color]

Install using NMM, or just simply drop the files
into the Skyrim Data folder in there respective places.



[color=#C00000][i][b][size=3]Recommended Mods:[/size][/b][/i][/color]

For dance animations:
Dance Animations - Shake it by indexMemories
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14521/?

Follower Management:
Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?

ENB in the (most) Screenshots:
Seasons of Skyrim ENB True HDR by Bronze316
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/?


For the Armor like in the Screenshots:
Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP by ChronoTrigger77
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?

For the Armor-Textures:
aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?



I played Skyrim Vanilla until September 2013 and
with first Mods since October 2013. On the 12th of
April 2014 was the time I opened the Creation Kit
and started using NifScope ;D
So if you find any errors please report them to me!
I will try to fix them as soon as possible. :)




[i][b][color=#C00000][size=3]Permissions:
[/size][/color][/b][/i]
This is a NEXUS EXCLUSIVE so please don't re-upload
it to another site.
Feel free to add your pics, i like seeing them!



[i][b][color=#C00000][size=3]Credits:[/size][/color][/b][/i]

Thank you for your great works and permissions!
